100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.cpu"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.cpu"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.cpu"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.cpu"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.memory"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.memory"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.memory"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.memory"})

sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) * 0.75 > sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0.1

sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) * 1.75 < sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0.1
